Editing 'h1n1_ref_viruses.trees' to generate 'h1n1_ref_viruses_e.trees'

To aid matching of phylogenetic tree and antigenic model model
By default, ggtree will read in a branch/node label value of '0001' as '1'.
To aid matching of ggtree object with JAGS output add a 'c' prefix to Control
identifiers added by tree2R.rb.

Find: Control="
Replace: Control="c
